entry.p: Once you start a tradition, it's hard to stop — people have expectations! So this week I was shoehorned into creating another installment of "words of the week" on my whiteboard at work. This week's theme is words of strong emotion (well, except for Friday's word — needed something calm and peaceful after all that Sturm und Drang):

ul.li: ululate (v.) — to howl or wail, especially in lamentation
